trans-unit.source: There are some special considerations to be made when OpenGL is used. The platform plugin only supports full screen top-level OpenGL windows. This means that even dialogs and popups will be shown as full screen. There may also be drawing errors if you try to stack windows that have animations or otherwise require updating their UI while they are obscured by another window.
trans-unit.target: 在使用OpenGL时,有一些特殊的注意事项。平台插件只支持全屏的顶层OpenGL窗口。这意味着即使是对话框和弹出窗口也会以全屏方式显示。如果你试图堆叠有动画的窗口或其他需要更新其UI的窗口,而它们被另一个窗口遮挡,也可能会出现绘图错误。

trans-unit.source: There are three element types: primitive elements, control elements, and complex control elements. The elements are defined by the ComplexControl, ControlElement, and PrimitiveElement enums. The values of each element enum has a prefix to identify their type: CC_ for complex elements, CE_ for control elements, and PE_ for primitive elements. We will in the following three sections see what defines the different elements and see examples of widgets that use them.
trans-unit.target: 共有三种元素类型：基本元素，控制元素和复杂控制元素。元素由ComplexControl，ControlElement和PrimitiveElement枚举定义。每个元素枚举的值都有一个前缀来标识其类型： CC_ 表示复杂元素， CE_ 表示控制元素， PE_ 表示基本元素。我们将在以下三个部分中看到定义不同元素的内容，并看到使用它们的小部件的示例。

trans-unit.source: There are three primary navigation operations in StackView: push(), pop(), and replace (replace by specifying argument replace to push()). These correspond to classic stack operations where "push" adds an item to the top of a stack, "pop" removes the top item from the stack, and "replace" is like a pop followed by a push, in that it replaces the topmost item on the stack with a new item (but the applied transtition might be different). The topmost item in the stack corresponds to the one that is currently visible on the screen. That means that "push" is the logical equivalent of navigating forward or deeper into the application, "pop" is the equivalent of navigating back, and "replace" is the equivalent of replacing the current item.
trans-unit.target: StackView中有三种主要的导航操作：push（），pop（）和replace（通过将参数 replace 指定为push（）来进行替换）。这些对应于经典的堆栈操作，其中“推”将项目添加到堆栈的顶部，“弹出”从堆栈中删除顶部的项目，而“替换”就像弹出后跟推的操作，因为它替换了最上面的项目一个新项目（但应用的过渡可能有所不同）。堆栈中最顶层的项目对应于当前在屏幕上可见。这意味着“推”在逻辑上等效于向前导航或深入到应用程序中，“弹出”与向后导航等效，“替换”与替换当前项目等效。

trans-unit.source: There are three primary navigation operations in StackView: push(), pop(), and replace (replace by specifying argument replace to push()). These correspond to classic stack operations where "push" adds an item to the top of a stack, "pop" removes the top item from the stack, and "replace" is like a pop followed by a push, in that it replaces the topmost item on the stack with a new item (but the applied transtition might be different). The topmost item in the stack corresponds to the one that is currently visible on the screen. That means that "push" is the logical equivalent of navigating forward or deeper into the application, "pop" is the equivalent of navigating back, and "replace" is the equivalent of replacing the current item.
trans-unit.target: StackView中有三种主要的导航操作：push（），pop（）和replace（通过将参数 replace 指定为push（）来进行替换）。这些对应于经典的堆栈操作，其中“推”将项目添加到堆栈的顶部，“弹出”从堆栈中删除顶部的项目，“替换”就像弹出后跟推的操作一样，因为它替换了最上面的项目一个新项目（但应用的过渡可能会有所不同）。堆栈中的最高项目对应于当前的项目在屏幕上可见。这意味着“推”在逻辑上等同于向前导航或深入到应用程序中，“弹出”与向后导航等同，而“替换”与替换当前项目等同。

trans-unit.source: There are three render loop variants available: basic, windows, and threaded. Out of these, basic and windows are single-threaded, while threaded performs scene graph rendering on a dedicated thread. Qt attempts to choose a suitable loop based on the platform and possibly the graphics drivers in use. When this is not satisfactory, or for testing purposes, the environment variable QSG_RENDER_LOOP can be used to force the usage of a given loop. To verify which render loop is in use, enable the qt.scenegraph.generallogging category.
trans-unit.target: 共有三种渲染循环变体： basic ， windows 和 threaded 。其中， basic 和 windows 是单线程的，而 threaded 在专用线程上执行场景图渲染。 Qt尝试根据平台以及可能使用的图形驱动程序选择合适的循环。当这不令人满意时，或者出于测试目的，可以使用环境变量 QSG_RENDER_LOOP 强制使用给定的循环。要验证使用哪个渲染循环，请启用 qt.scenegraph.general 日志记录类别。

trans-unit.source: There are three signals emitted if the current item of a combobox changes, currentIndexChanged(), currentTextChanged() and activated(). currentIndexChanged() and currentTextChanged() are always emitted regardless if the change was done programmatically or by user interaction, while activated() is only emitted when the change is caused by user interaction. The highlighted() signal is emitted when the user highlights an item in the combobox popup list. All three signals exist in two versions, one with a QString argument and one with an int argument. If the user selects or highlights a pixmap, only the int signals are emitted. Whenever the text of an editable combobox is changed the editTextChanged() signal is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果组合框的当前项目发生更改，则将发出三个信号，分别是currentIndexChanged（），currentTextChanged（）和Activated（）。无论更改是通过编程方式还是通过用户交互完成，始终都会发出currentIndexChanged（）和currentTextChanged（），而仅当更改是由用户交互引起时才发出activate（）。当用户突出显示组合框弹出列表中的项目时，将突出显示（）信号。所有这三个信号都有两种版本，一种带有QString参数，另一种带有 int 参数。如果用户选择或突出显示像素图，则仅 int 发出int信号。只要更改了可编辑组合框的文本，就会发出editTextChanged（）信号。

trans-unit.source: There are three types of socket notifiers: read, write, and exception. The type is described by the Type enum, and must be specified when constructing the socket notifier. After construction it can be determined using the type() function. Note that if you need to monitor both reads and writes for the same file descriptor, you must create two socket notifiers. Note also that it is not possible to install two socket notifiers of the same type (Read, Write, Exception) on the same socket.
trans-unit.target: 套接字通知程序分为三种：读，写和异常。该类型由Type枚举描述，并且在构造套接字通知程序时必须指定该类型。构造后，可以使用type（）函数确定。请注意，如果需要监视同一文件描述符的读写操作，则必须创建两个套接字通知器。还要注意，不可能在同一套接字上安装两个相同类型的套接字通知程序（Read，Write，Exception）。

trans-unit.source: There are two functions that give information about the actions that must return localized strings: localizedActionName() and localizedActionDescription(). These functions can be used by the client to present the actions to the user. In general, the name should be concise and only consist of a single word, such as "press".

trans-unit.source: There are two kinds of show events: show events caused by the window system (spontaneous), and internal show events. Spontaneous (QEvent::spontaneous()) show events are sent just after the window system shows the window; they are also sent when a top-level window is redisplayed after being iconified. Internal show events are delivered just before the widget becomes visible.
trans-unit.target: 显示事件有两种：由窗口系统（自发）引起的显示事件和内部显示事件。自发（QEvent :: spontaneous（））显示事件在窗口系统显示窗口之后立即发送；在图标化后重新显示顶级窗口时，也会发送它们。内部显示事件在窗口小部件变得可见之前传递。

trans-unit.source: There are two main types of custom materials. This is specified by the shadingMode property. In unshaded custom materials the fragment shader outputs a single vec4 color, ignoring lights, light probes, shadowing in the scene. In shaded materials the shader is expected to implement certain functions and work with built-in variables to take lighting and shadow contribution into account.
trans-unit.target: 定制材料主要有两种。这是由shadingMode属性指定的。在非阴影定制材料片段着色器输出单个 vec4 颜色，忽略灯，光探针，在场景中阴影。在着色材质中，着色器有望实现某些功能并与内置变量一起使用，以考虑到光照和阴影的影响。

trans-unit.source: There are two notable differences to be aware of: First, with Vulkan Y points down the screen in clip space, while OpenGL uses an upwards pointing Y axis. Second, the standard OpenGL projection matrix assume a near and far plane values of -1 and 1, while Vulkan prefers 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 有两个明显的区别需要注意。首先,Vulkan的Y轴指向屏幕下方的剪辑空间,而OpenGL则使用向上的Y轴。第二,标准的OpenGL投影矩阵假设近、远平面值为-1和1,而Vulkan更倾向于0和1。

trans-unit.source: There are two occasions where a fetch is done implicitly by another function call: during construction (so that the object starts out with some initial data where available), and during a call to next() (if the data had run out).
trans-unit.target: 在两种情况下，通过另一个函数调用隐式完成访存：在构造过程中（这样，对象将以可用的一些初始数据开始），在调用next（）期间（如果数据已用完）。

trans-unit.source: There are two platform plugins that are usable on VxWorks: EGLFS and VxWorksFB. The availability of these plugins depends on the configuration of Qt. The default platform plugin is also device-specific. For instance, on many boards eglfs will be chosen as the default one. If the default is not suitable, the QT_QPA_PLATFORM environment variable parameter can be used to request another plugin. Alternatively, for quick tests, the -platform command-line option can be used with the same syntax.
trans-unit.target: VxWorks上有两个可用的平台插件：EGLFS和VxWorksFB。这些插件的可用性取决于Qt的配置。默认平台插件也是特定于设备的。例如，在许多板上， eglfs 将被选作默认值。如果默认值不合适，则可以使用 QT_QPA_PLATFORM 环境变量参数来请求另一个插件。另外，对于快速测试，可以将 -platform 命令行选项与相同的语法一起使用。

The highlighted() signal is emitted when the user highlights an item in the combobox popup list. All three signals exist in two versions, one with a QString argument and one with an int argument. If the user selects or highlights a pixmap, only the int signals are emitted. Whenever the text of an editable combobox is changed the editTextChanged() signal is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 有射出如果组合框的改变的当前项，两个信号currentIndexChanged（）和激活（）。无论更改是通过编程方式还是通过用户交互完成，始终都会发出currentIndexChanged（），而仅当更改是由用户交互引起时才发出activate（）。当用户突出显示组合框弹出列表中的项目时，将突出显示（）信号。所有这三种信号都有两种版本，一种带有QString参数，另一种带有 int 参数。如果用户选择或突出显示像素图，则仅会发出 int 信号。每当更改可编辑组合框的文本时，发出editTextChanged（）信号。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of bindings in QML: optimized and non-optimized bindings. It is a good idea to keep binding expressions as simple as possible, since the QML engine makes use of an optimized binding expression evaluator which can evaluate simple binding expressions without needing to switch into a full JavaScript execution environment. These optimized bindings are evaluated far more efficiently than more complex (non-optimized) bindings. The basic requirement for optimization of bindings is that the type information of every symbol accessed must be known at compile time.
trans-unit.target: QML中有两种类型的绑定:优化绑定和非优化绑定。保持绑定表达式尽可能简单是个好主意,因为QML引擎使用了一个优化的绑定表达式评估器,它可以评估简单的绑定表达式,而不需要切换到一个完整的JavaScript执行环境。这些优化过的绑定表达式的评估效率远远高于更复杂(非优化)的绑定表达式。优化绑定的基本要求是,在编译时必须知道每个被访问的符号的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of proxies that Qt understands: transparent proxies and caching proxies. The first group consists of proxies that can handle any arbitrary data transfer, while the second can only handle specific requests. The caching proxies only make sense for the specific classes where they can be used.
trans-unit.target: Qt所理解的代理有两类:透明代理和缓存代理。第一类包括可以处理任何任意数据传输的代理,而第二类只能处理特定的请求。缓存代理只有在特定的类中使用才有意义。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of purchases supported by QInAppStore: QInAppProduct::Consumable and QInAppProduct::Unlockable. The former will be consumed when the transaction is completed and QInAppTransaction::finalize() is called, meaning that it can be purchased again, any number of times. Unlockable items can only be purchased once.
trans-unit.target: QInAppStore支持两种类型的购买：QInAppProduct :: Consumable和QInAppProduct :: Unlockable。当交易完成并调用QInAppTransaction :: finalize（）时，将消耗前者，这意味着可以多次购买它。解锁物品只能购买一次。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of purchases supported by QInAppStore: QInAppProduct::Consumable and QInAppProduct::Unlockable. The former will be consumed when the transaction is completed and QInAppTransaction::finalize() is called, meaning that it can be purchased again, any number of times. Unlockable items can only be purchased once.
trans-unit.target: QInAppStore支持两种类型的购买：QInAppProduct :: Consumable和QInAppProduct :: Unlockable。当交易完成并调用QInAppTransaction :: finalize（）时，前者将被使用，这意味着可以多次购买它。解锁物品只能购买一次。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of qmake functions: replace functions and test functions. Replace functions return a value list, while test functions return a boolean result. The functions are implemented in two places: fundamental functionality is offered as built-in functions. More complex functions are implemented in a library of feature files (.prf).
trans-unit.target: qmake函数有两种类型:替换函数和测试函数。替换函数返回一个值列表,而测试函数返回一个布尔结果。这些函数在两个地方实现:基本功能以内置函数的形式提供。更复杂的函数在特征文件库(.prf)中实现。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways Qt XML Patterns can be used to evaluate queries. You can run the query engine in your Qt application using the Qt XML Patterns C++ API, or you can run the query engine from the command line using Qt's xmlpatterns command line utility.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to affect how QVariantAnimation interpolates the values. trans-unit.source: There are two ways to construct an item group. The easiest and most common approach is to pass a list of items (e.g., all selected items) to QGraphicsScene::createItemGroup(), which returns a new QGraphicsItemGroup item. The other approach is to manually construct a QGraphicsItemGroup item, add it to the scene calling QGraphicsScene::addItem(), and then add items to the group manually, one at a time by calling addToGroup(). To dismantle ("ungroup") an item group, you can either call QGraphicsScene::destroyItemGroup(), or you can manually remove all items from the group by calling removeFromGroup().
trans-unit.target: 有两种构造项目组的方法。最简单，最常见的方法是将项目列表（例如，所有选定的项目）传递给QGraphicsScene :: createItemGroup（），该方法将返回新的QGraphicsItemGroup项目。另一种方法是手动构造QGraphicsItemGroup项，将其添加到调用QGraphicsScene :: addItem（）的场景中，然后通过调用addToGroup（）一次将项手动添加到组中。要拆除（“取消分组”）项目组，可以调用QGraphicsScene :: destroyItemGroup（），也可以通过调用removeFromGroup（）手动从组中删除所有项目。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to construct an item group. The easiest and most common approach is to pass a list of items (e.g., all selected items) to QGraphicsScene::createItemGroup(), which returns a new QGraphicsItemGroup item. The other approach is to manually construct a QGraphicsItemGroup item, add it to the scene calling QGraphicsScene::addItem(), and then add items to the group manually, one at a time by calling addToGroup(). To dismantle ("ungroup") an item group, you can either call QGraphicsScene::destroyItemGroup(), or you can manually remove all items from the group by calling removeFromGroup().
trans-unit.target: 有两种构造项目组的方法。最简单，最常见的方法是将项目列表（例如，所有选定的项目）传递给QGraphicsScene :: createItemGroup（），后者将返回一个新的QGraphicsItemGroup项目。另一种方法是手动构造QGraphicsItemGroup项，将其添加到调用QGraphicsScene :: addItem（）的场景中，然后通过调用addToGroup（）一次将项手动添加到组中。要拆除（“取消分组”）项目组，可以调用QGraphicsScene :: destroyItemGroup（），也可以通过调用removeFromGroup（）手动从组中删除所有项目。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to create objects dynamically from JavaScript. You can either call Qt.createComponent() to dynamically create a Component object, or use Qt.createQmlObject() to create an object from a string of QML. Creating a component is better if you have an existing component defined in a QML document and you want to dynamically create instances of that component. Otherwise, creating an object from a string of QML is useful when the object QML itself is generated at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法可以从JavaScript动态创建对象。您可以调用Qt.createComponent（）动态创建Component对象，也可以使用Qt.createQmlObject（）从QML字符串创建对象。如果您在QML文档中定义了现有组件，并且想要动态创建该组件的实例，则创建组件会更好。否则，当在运行时生成对象QML本身时，从QML字符串创建对象很有用。

trans-unit.source: There is a <Type>SimpleSource class defined in the header, which provides basic getter/setter methods for each property and implements data members of the correct property type in the header. Here "<Type>" represents the class name from the .rep file, so if your class is of type "MyType" in the .rep file, there will be a MyTypeSimpleSource class declared in the generated header file. This is a fast way to get started using the API. To use this class, you need to inherit from this class and implement any defined slots (which are pure virtual in the generated header file). Whatever logic is needed to manage the exposed properties and emit signals would be added to the inheriting class as well.
trans-unit.target: 标头中定义了一个<Type> SimpleSource类，该类为每个属性提供基本的getter / setter方法，并在标头中实现具有正确属性类型的数据成员。这里的“ <Type>”表示.rep文件中的类名，因此，如果您的类在.rep文件中为“ MyType”类型，则在生成的头文件中将声明MyTypeSimpleSource类。这是开始使用API​​的快速方法。要使用此类，您需要从此类继承并实现任何已定义的插槽（在生成的头文件中为纯虚拟插槽）。管理公开属性和发出信号所需的任何逻辑也将添加到继承类中。

trans-unit.source: There is a <Type>SimpleSource class defined in the header, which provides the basic getter/setter methods for each property and implements data members of the correct property type in the header. "<Type>" here represents the class name from the .rep file, so if your class is of type "MyType" in the .rep file, then the generated header file will have a MyTypeSimpleSource class declared. This is a quick way to get started using the API. To use this class, you need to write a class that inherits from it and implement any slots defined, which are marked as pure virtual in the generated header file. You need to add the necessary logic to manage the exposed properties and emit signals, to your class as well.
trans-unit.target: 标头中定义了一个<Type> SimpleSource类，该类为每个属性提供了基本的getter / setter方法，并在标头中实现了正确属性类型的数据成员。“ <Type>”在这里表示 .rep 文件中的类名，因此，如果您的类在 .rep 文件中为“ MyType”类型，则生成的头文件将声明一个MyTypeSimpleSource类。这是开始使用API​​的快速方法。要使用此类，您需要编写一个从其继承的类并实现定义的所有插槽，这些插槽在生成的头文件中被标记为纯虚拟的。您还需要向类添加必要的逻辑来管理公开的属性并发出信号。

trans-unit.source: There is a third constructor that creates a QRect using the top-left and bottom-right coordinates, but we recommend that you avoid using it. trans-unit.source: There is a third constructor that creates a QRect using the top-left and bottom-right coordinates, but we recommend that you avoid using it. trans-unit.source: There is currently no zeroconf facility included in QtRO. All processes or devices must therefore know beforehand how to connect to each other. A QRemoteObjectRegistry (see below) can be used to simplify the connection process for a network with multiple Host Nodes.
trans-unit.target: 目前还没有零配置包含在QtRO设施。因此，所有进程或设备都必须事先知道如何相互连接。甲QRemoteObjectRegistry（见下文）可以被用于简化连接过程用于具有多个主机节点的网络。

trans-unit.source: There is much more to the XQuery language than we have presented in this short introduction. We will be adding more here in later releases. In the meantime, playing with the xmlpatterns utility and making modifications to the XQuery examples provided here will be quite informative. An XQuery textbook will be a good investment.
trans-unit.target: XQuery语言比本简短介绍中介绍的要多得多。我们将在以后的版本中添加更多内容。同时，使用 xmlpatterns 实用程序并对此处提供的XQuery示例进行修改将非常有用。一个XQuery的教科书将是一个很好的投资。

trans-unit.source: There is no default Bluetooth device to perform the service discovery. The model always uses the local default adapter. Specifying a default adapter is not possible. If that's required, QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent should be directly used. This value was introduced by Qt 5.4.

trans-unit.source: There is no direct way to do wildcard matching in QRegularExpression. However, the wildcardToRegularExpression method is provided to translate glob patterns into a Perl-compatible regular expression that can be used for that purpose.
trans-unit.target: 在QRegularExpression中没有直接的方法可以进行通配符匹配。但是，提供了wildcardToRegularExpression方法可将全局模式转换为可用于此目的的Perl兼容正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: There is no direct way to do wildcard matching in QRegularExpression. However, the QRegularExpression::wildcardToRegularExpression method is provided to translate glob patterns into a Perl-compatible regular expression that can be used for that purpose.

trans-unit.source: There is no direction associated with the instruction text.
trans-unit.target: 没有与指令文本相关的方向。

trans-unit.source: There is no explicit size restriction on an offset from UTC, but there is an implicit limit imposed when using the toString() and fromString() methods which use a [+|-]hh:mm format, effectively limiting the range to +/- 99 hours and 59 minutes and whole minutes only. Note that currently no time zone lies outside the range of +/- 14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 对UTC的偏移量没有明确的大小限制，但是当使用toString（）和fromString（）方法使用[+ |-] hh：mm格式时，存在隐式限制，有效地将范围限制为+ / -仅99小时59分钟和整分钟。请注意，当前没有时区超出+/- 14小时的范围。

trans-unit.source: There is no minimum or maximum angle for this property, but the default style only supports angles whose absolute range is less than or equal to 360 degrees. This is because ranges higher than 360 degrees will cause the tickmarks and labels to overlap each other.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有最小或最大角度，但是默认样式仅支持绝对范围小于或等于 360 度的角度。这是因为高于 360 度的范围将导致刻度线和标签相互重叠。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to call makeCurrent() because this has already been done when this function is called.
trans-unit.target: 无需调用makeCurrent（），因为在调用此函数时已经完成了此操作。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to call makeCurrent() because this has already been done when this function is called. Additionally, the framebuffer is also bound.
trans-unit.target: 无需调用makeCurrent（），因为在调用此函数时已经完成了此操作。另外，帧缓冲区也被绑定。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to call makeCurrent() because this has already been done when this function is called. Note however that the framebuffer is not yet available at this stage, so avoid issuing draw calls from here. Defer such calls to paintGL() instead.
trans-unit.target: 无需调用makeCurrent（），因为在调用此函数时已经完成了此操作。但是请注意，帧缓冲在此阶段尚不可用，因此请避免从此处发出绘图调用。将此类调用推迟到paintGL（）。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to call makeCurrent() because this has already been done when this function is called.
trans-unit.target: 无需调用makeCurrent（），因为在调用此函数时已经完成了此操作。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to call makeCurrent() because this has already been done when this function is called. Note however that the framebuffer, in case partial update mode is used, is not yet available at this stage, so avoid issuing draw calls from here. Defer such calls to paintGL() instead.
trans-unit.target: 无需调用makeCurrent（），因为在调用此函数时已经完成了此操作。但是请注意，在使用部分更新模式的情况下，帧缓冲区在此阶段尚不可用，因此请避免从此处发出绘图调用。将此类调用推迟到paintGL（）。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to call this before destroying the QVulkanInstance since clean up is then performed automatically.
trans-unit.target: 销毁QVulkanInstance之前无需调用此函数，因为清理会自动执行。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to lay out a menu bar. It automatically sets its own geometry to the top of the parent widget and changes it appropriately whenever the parent is resized.
trans-unit.target: 不需要布置一个菜单栏。它自动将自己的几何体设置到父部件的顶部,并在父部件调整大小时适当地改变它。

trans-unit.source: There is no opacity mask by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下没有不透明度遮罩。

trans-unit.source: There is no radio service available.
trans-unit.target: 没有无线电服务。

trans-unit.source: There is no recommended action to be performed.
trans-unit.target: 没有建议采取的行动。

trans-unit.source: There is no replacement for the CaretMode enumeration. The QRegularExpression::AnchoredMatchOption match option can be used to emulate the QRegExp::CaretAtOffset behavior. There is no equivalent for the other QRegExp::CaretMode modes.
trans-unit.target: 没有替代CaretMode枚举的方法。该QRegularExpression :: AnchoredMatchOption匹配选项可以用来模拟QRegExp :: CaretAtOffset行为。其他QRegExp :: CaretMode模式没有等效的方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no risk of deadlocks when using the event system for thread synchronization, unlike using low-level primitives. However, the event system does not enforce mutual exclusion. If invokable methods access shared data, they must still be protected with low-level primitives.
trans-unit.target: 与使用低级基元不同,使用事件系统进行线程同步时没有死锁的风险。但是,事件系统并不强制执行相互排斥。如果可调用的方法访问共享数据,它们仍然必须使用低级基元进行保护。

trans-unit.source: There is no service available to provide the requested functionality.
trans-unit.target: 没有提供所需功能的服务。

trans-unit.source: There is no setter for the node model because instances of QXmlNodeModelIndex instances are only created with QAbstractXmlNodeModel::createIndex().
trans-unit.target: 节点模型没有设置器，因为QXmlNodeModelIndex实例的实例仅使用QAbstractXmlNodeModel :: createIndex（）创建。

trans-unit.source: There is no single correct 3D coordinate to match a particular screen position, so to be consistent, the queries are always done against the inner sides of an invisible box surrounding the graph.
trans-unit.target: 没有一个正确的三维坐标来匹配特定的屏幕位置,所以为了保持一致,查询总是针对图形周围的隐形框的内侧进行。

trans-unit.source: There is no such file to load into the default XML node model, but one can write a subclass of QAbstractXmlNodeModel to represent the file system. This custom XML node model, once populated with all the directory and file descriptors obtained directly from the system, presents the complete file system hierarchy to the query engine via the same API used by the default XML node model to present the contents of an XML file. In other words, once the custom XML node model is populated, it presents the file system to the query engine as if a description of it had been loaded into the default XML node model from an XML file like the one shown above.
trans-unit.target: 没有此类文件可加载到默认的XML节点模型中，但是可以编写QAbstractXmlNodeModel的子类来表示文件系统。这个自定义XML节点模型一旦填充了直接从系统中获得的所有目录和文件描述符，便会通过默认XML节点模型所使用的相同API将完整的文件系统层次结构提供给查询引擎，以显示XML文件的内容。换句话说，一旦填充了自定义XML节点模型，它就会将文件系统呈现给查询引擎，就好像它的描述已从XML文件中加载到默认XML节点模型中一样（如上所示）。

trans-unit.source: There is no support for describing YUV's macro pixels. Instead a list of YUV formats has been made. When a QPixelFormat is describing a YUV format, the bitsPerPixel value has been deduced by the YUV Layout enum. Also, the color channels should all be set to zero except the fifth color channel that should store the bitsPerPixel value.
trans-unit.target: 不支持描述YUV的宏像素。而是列出了YUV格式。当QPixelFormat描述YUV格式时，由YUV Layout枚举推导出bitsPerPixel值。同样，除了应该存储bitsPerPixel值的第五个颜色通道之外，所有颜色通道都应设置为零。

trans-unit.source: There is no support for describing YUV's macro pixels. Instead a list of YUV formats has been made. When a QPixelFormat is describing a YUV format, the bitsPerPixel value has been deduced by the YUV Layout enum. Also, the color channels should all be set to zero except the fifth color channel that should store the bitsPerPixel value.
trans-unit.target: 不支持描述YUV的宏像素。而是列出了YUV格式。当QPixelFormat描述YUV格式时，由YUV Layout枚举推导出bitsPerPixel值。此外，颜色通道应全部设置为零，但第五个颜色通道应存储bitsPerPixel值。

trans-unit.source: There is no year 0. Dates in that year are considered invalid. The year -1 is the year "1 before Christ" or "1 before current era." The day before 1 January 1 CE is 31 December 1 BCE.
trans-unit.target: 没有0年。该年的日期被认为是无效的。年-1为 "基督前1年 "或 "本纪元前1年"。公元1月1日的前一天是公元前12月1日。

trans-unit.source: There is no year 0. Dates in that year are considered invalid. The year -1 is the year "1 before Christ" or "1 before current era." The day before 1 January 1 CE, QDate(1, 1, 1), is 31 December 1 BCE, QDate(-1, 12, 31).
trans-unit.target: 没有0年。该年中的日期被视为无效。-1年是“基督之前1年”或“当前时代之前1年”。公元1年1月1日，QDate（1、1、1）的前一天是公元前1年1月1日，QDate（-1、12、31）。

trans-unit.source: There is one bug that is so common that it deserves mention here: If you include the Q_OBJECT macro in a class declaration and run the meta-object compiler (moc), but forget to link the moc-generated object code into your executable, you will get very confusing error messages. Any link error complaining about a lack of vtbl, _vtbl, __vtbl or similar is likely to be a result of this problem.
trans-unit.target: 有一个非常普遍的错误，因此值得在这里提及：如果在类声明中包含Q_OBJECT宏并运行元对象编译器（ moc ），但是忘记将 moc 生成的目标代码链接到可执行文件中，将会得到非常混乱的错误消息。任何抱怨缺少 vtbl ， _vtbl ， __vtbl vtbl或类似内容的链接错误都可能是此问题的结果。

trans-unit.source: There is one bug that is so common that it deserves mention here: If you include the Q_OBJECT macro in a class declaration and run the meta-object compiler (moc), but forget to link the moc-generated object code into your executable, you will get very confusing error messages. Any link error complaining about a lack of vtbl, _vtbl, __vtbl or similar is likely to be a result of this problem.
trans-unit.target: 有一个很常见的错误，因此值得在这里提及：如果在类声明中包含Q_OBJECT宏并运行元对象编译器（ moc ），但是忘记将 moc 生成的目标代码链接到可执行文件中，将收到非常混乱的错误消息。任何抱怨缺少 vtbl ， _vtbl ， __vtbl vtbl或类似内容的链接错误都可能是此问题的结果。

trans-unit.source: There is some redundancy between this property and QInputDevice::DeviceType. For example, if a touchscreen is used, then the DeviceType is TouchScreen and PointerType is Finger (always). But on a graphics tablet, it's often possible for both ends of the stylus to be used, and programs need to distinguish them. Therefore the concept is extended so that every QPointerEvent has a PointerType, and it can simplify some event handling code to ignore the DeviceType and react differently depending on the PointerType alone.
trans-unit.target: 此属性和QInputDevice :: DeviceType之间存在一些冗余。例如，如果使用触摸屏，则 DeviceType 为 TouchScreen ,而 PointerType 为 Finger （始终）。但是在图形输入板上，通常可以同时使用手写笔的两端，并且程序需要对其进行区分。因此，对该概念进行了扩展，以便每个QPointerEvent都有一个PointerType，并且它可以简化一些事件处理代码，以忽略DeviceType并仅根据PointerType做出不同的反应。

trans-unit.source: There is some redundancy between this property and PointerDevice::type. If a tocuchscreen is used, then the device is TouchScreen and pointerType is Finger (always).
trans-unit.target: 这个属性和PointerDevice :: type之间有一些冗余。如果使用了tocuchscreen，则设备为TouchScreen，pointerType为Finger（始终）。

trans-unit.source: There is typically no need to perform anything special in this function. QVulkanWindow will automatically release all resources (invoking releaseSwapChainResources() and releaseResources() as necessary) and will attempt to reinitialize, acquiring a new device. When the physical device was also lost, this reinitialization attempt may then result in physicalDeviceLost().
trans-unit.target: 通常不需要执行此功能中的任何特殊操作。QVulkanWindow将自动释放所有资源（必要时调用releaseSwapChainResources（）和releaseResources（）），并尝试重新初始化，以获取新设备。当物理设备也丢失时，此重新初始化尝试可能会导致physicalDeviceLost（）。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to access the pointer that QWeakPointer is tracking, you must first promote it to QSharedPointer and verify if the resulting object is null or not. QSharedPointer guarantees that the object isn't deleted, so if you obtain a non-null object, you may use the pointer. See QWeakPointer::toStrongRef() for an example.
trans-unit.target: 因此，要访问QWeakPointer跟踪的指针，必须首先将其提升为QSharedPointer并验证结果对象是否为null。QSharedPointer保证不会删除该对象，因此，如果获得非空对象，则可以使用指针。有关示例，请参见QWeakPointer :: toStrongRef（）。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, writes to elements of a reference sequence will be much slower than writes to elements of a copy sequence. In fact, writing to a single element of an N-element reference sequence is equivalent in cost to assigning a N-element copy sequence to that reference sequence, so you're usually better off modifying a temporary copy sequence and then assigning the result to a reference sequence, during computation.
trans-unit.target: 因此,对参考序列元素的写入将比对副本序列元素的写入慢得多。事实上,写到一个N元素参考序列的单个元素,在成本上等同于将一个N元素的拷贝序列分配给该参考序列,所以在计算过程中,你通常最好修改一个临时拷贝序列,然后将结果分配给一个参考序列。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should remove properties that are not required from your resulting XML files, before loading them. Alternatively, if you already know which properties you want to save when you call this method, you can overload computeProperties() and return a filtered list of required properties. Otherwise, unexpected behavior may occur as some of these properties may depend on each other.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在加载结果XML文件之前，应删除不需要的属性。另外，如果在调用此方法时已经知道要保存哪些属性，则可以重载 computeProperties() 并返回过滤后的必需属性列表。否则，可能会发生意外行为，因为其中某些属性可能相互依赖。

trans-unit.source: These are sufficient to render the mesh. For indexed drawing, the index buffer data and an attribute with IndexSemantic needs to be specified as well. In order to support picking (input), the class must specify the bounding volume using setBounds(). For proper lighting, an attribute with NormalSemantic is needed. When the material uses texturing, at least one set of UV coordinates must be provided and described in an TexCoordSemantic attribute. Some materials may require tangents and binormals as well.
trans-unit.target: 这些足以渲染网格。对于索引工程图，还需要指定索引缓冲区数据和具有IndexSemantic的属性。为了支持拾取（输入），该类必须使用setBounds（）指定边界体积。为了获得适当的照明，需要具有NormalSemantic的属性。当材料使用纹理时，必须提供至少一组UV坐标，并在TexCoordSemantic属性中进行描述。某些材料可能还需要切线和双法线。

trans-unit.source: These classes derive from QAbstractTableModel (which in turn inherits from QAbstractItemModel) and make it easy to present data from a database in an item view class such as QListView and QTableView. This is explained in detail in the Presenting Data in a Table View section.

trans-unit.source: These classes derive from QAbstractTableModel (which in turn inherits from QAbstractItemModel) and make it easy to present data from a database in an item view class such as QListView and QTableView. This is explained in detail in the Presenting Data in a Table View section.

trans-unit.source: These classes link the data from a database to data-aware widgets. They include QSqlQueryModel, QSqlTableModel, and QSqlRelationalTableModel. These classes are designed to work with Qt's model/view framework.

trans-unit.source: These classes provide access to databases. Connections are made using the QSqlDatabase class. Database interaction is achieved by using the QSqlQuery class. In addition to QSqlDatabase and QSqlQuery, the SQL API layer is supported by QSqlError, QSqlField, QSqlIndex, and QSqlRecord.
trans-unit.target: 这些类提供对数据库的访问。使用QSqlDatabase类进行连接。数据库交互是通过使用QSqlQuery类实现的。除了QSqlDatabase和QSqlQuery，该SQL API层通过支持QSqlError，QSqlField，QSqlIndex，和QSqlRecord。

trans-unit.source: These classes provide access to databases. Connections are made using the QSqlDatabase class. Database interaction is achieved by using the QSqlQuery class. In addition to QSqlDatabase and QSqlQuery, the SQL API layer is supported by QSqlError, QSqlField, QSqlIndex, and QSqlRecord.
trans-unit.target: 这些类提供对数据库的访问。使用QSqlDatabase类进行连接。数据库交互是通过使用QSqlQuery类实现的。除了QSqlDatabase和QSqlQuery，该SQL API层通过支持QSqlError，QSqlField，QSqlIndex，和QSqlRecord。

trans-unit.source: These classes provide convenience wrappers that reduce the need for casting. Each of these classes represents a sensor type that the Qt Sensors API knows about. Note that additional types may be made available at run-time. See Sensor Types for more information.

trans-unit.source: These commands are for indicating that a documented element has some special status. The element could be marked as about to be made obsolete, or that it is simply not to be included in the public interface. The \since command is for specifying the version number in which a function or class first appeared. The \qmlabstract command is for marking a QML type as an abstract base class.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令用于指示已记录元素具有某些特殊状态。可以将元素标记为即将过时，或者仅将其不包含在公共接口中。所述自\命令是用于指定其中一个函数或类首次出现的版本号。所述\ qmlabstract命令是用于标记QML类型作为一个抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: These four approaches to customizing and making materials, effects, geometry, and textures dynamic enable the programmability of shading and procedural generation of the data the shaders get as their input. The following sections provide an overview of these features. The full reference is available in the documentation pages for the respective types:

trans-unit.source: These four functions must be implemented in all types of model, including list models (QAbstractListModel subclasses) and table models (QAbstractTableModel subclasses).
trans-unit.target: 这四个函数必须在所有类型的模型中实现，包括列表模型（QAbstractListModel子类）和表模型（QAbstractTableModel子类）。

trans-unit.source: These functions allow the programmer to move forward, backward or arbitrarily through the records returned by the query. If you only need to move forward through the results (e.g., by using next()), you can use setForwardOnly(), which will save a significant amount of memory overhead and improve performance on some databases. Once an active query is positioned on a valid record, data can be retrieved using value(). All data is transferred from the SQL backend using QVariants.
trans-unit.target: 这些功能允许程序员通过查询返回的记录向前，向后或任意移动。如果只需要向前移动结果（例如，使用next（）），则可以使用setForwardOnly（），这将节省大量的内存开销并提高某些数据库的性能。一旦将活动查询放置在有效记录上，就可以使用值（）检索数据。使用QVariants从SQL后端传输所有数据。

trans-unit.source: These options only control how dock widgets may be dropped in a QMainWindow. They do not re-arrange the dock widgets to conform with the specified options. For this reason they should be set before any dock widgets are added to the main window. Exceptions to this are the AnimatedDocks and VerticalTabs options, which may be set at any time.
trans-unit.target: 这些选项仅控制如何将停靠小部件放置在QMainWindow中。他们不会重新排列停靠小部件以使其符合指定的选项。因此，应在将任何停靠小部件添加到主窗口之前进行设置。AnimatedDocks和VerticalTabs选项是例外，可以随时设置。

trans-unit.source: These parameters are all followed by a comma-separated list. The list must include GLSL-style version numbers, with an optional suffix (es, indicating GLSL ES). The space between the suffix and the version is optional (not having the space can help avoiding the need for quoting).
trans-unit.target: 这些参数后均跟一个逗号分隔的列表。该列表必须包含GLSL样式的版本号，并带有可选的后缀（ es ，表示GLSL ES）。后缀和版本之间的空格是可选的（不带空格可以帮助避免引用）。

trans-unit.source: These parameters describe key details of the route, such as waypoints to pass through, excludedAreas to avoid, the travelModes in use, as well as detailed preferences on how to optimize the route and what features to prefer or avoid along the path (such as toll roads, highways, etc).
trans-unit.target: 这些参数描述路线的关键细节，如航点通过，excludedAreas避免的，在travelModes使用，以及如何优化路线和什么功能沿路径优选或避免详细的喜好（如收费道路，高速公路等）。

trans-unit.source: These properties affect the position of the current item when the list is scrolled. For example, if the currently selected item should stay in the middle of the list when the view is scrolled, set the preferredHighlightBegin and preferredHighlightEnd values to the top and bottom coordinates of where the middle item would be. If the currentItem is changed programmatically, the list will automatically scroll so that the current item is in the middle of the view. Furthermore, the behavior of the current item index will occur whether or not a highlight exists.
trans-unit.target: 当滚动列表时，这些属性会影响当前项目的位置。例如，如果在滚动视图时当前选定的项目应停留在列表的中间，则将 preferredHighlightBegin 和 preferredHighlightEnd 值设置为中间项目所在位置的顶部和底部坐标。如果以编程方式更改 currentItem ，则列表将自动滚动，以使当前项目位于视图的中间。此外，无论是否存在突出显示，都会发生当前项目索引的行为。

trans-unit.source: These properties affect the position of the current item when the view is scrolled. For example, if the currently selected item should stay in the middle of the view when it is scrolled, set the preferredHighlightBegin and preferredHighlightEnd values to the top and bottom coordinates of where the middle item would be. If the currentItem is changed programmatically, the view will automatically scroll so that the current item is in the middle of the view. Furthermore, the behavior of the current item index will occur whether or not a highlight exists.
trans-unit.target: 当滚动视图时，这些属性会影响当前项目的位置。例如，如果当前选定的项目在滚动时应停留在视图的中间，则将 preferredHighlightBegin 和 preferredHighlightEnd 值设置为中间项目所在位置的顶部和底部坐标。如果以编程方式更改 currentItem ，则视图将自动滚动，以使当前项目位于视图的中间。此外，无论是否存在突出显示，都会发生当前项目索引的行为。

trans-unit.target: 如果可翻转视图分别位于开头或结尾,这些属性为真。

trans-unit.source: These properties can be combined to produce a variety of layouts, as shown in the table below. The GridViews in the first row all have a flow value of GridView.FlowLeftToRight, but use different combinations of horizontal and vertical layout directions (specified by layoutDirection and verticalLayoutDirection respectively). Similarly, the GridViews in the second row below all have a flow value of GridView.FlowTopToBottom, but use different combinations of horizontal and vertical layout directions to lay out their items in different ways.
trans-unit.target: 可以组合这些属性以产生各种布局，如下表所示。第一行中的GridView的流值均为GridView .FlowLeftToRight，但使用水平和垂直布局方向的不同组合（分别由layoutDirection和verticalLayoutDirection指定）。同样，下面第二行中的GridView的流值均为GridView .FlowTopToBottom，但是使用水平和垂直布局方向的不同组合以不同的方式布置其项目。

trans-unit.source: These properties can be combined to produce a variety of layouts, as shown in the table below. The GridViews in the first row all have a flow value of GridView.FlowLeftToRight, but use different combinations of horizontal and vertical layout directions (specified by layoutDirection and verticalLayoutDirection respectively). Similarly, the GridViews in the second row below all have a flow value of GridView.FlowTopToBottom, but use different combinations of horizontal and vertical layout directions to lay out their items in different ways.
trans-unit.target: 可以组合这些属性以产生各种布局，如下表所示。第一行中的GridView都具有GridView.FlowLeftToRight的流值，但是使用水平和垂直布局方向的不同组合（分别由layoutDirection和verticalLayoutDirection指定）。类似地，下面第二行中的GridView的流值均为GridView.FlowTopToBottom，但是使用水平和垂直布局方向的不同组合以不同的方式布置其项目。

trans-unit.source: These properties can be used to verify the purchase using the public key of your application. It is also possible to have the back-end verify the purchases by passing in the public key before registering products, using QInAppStore::setPlatformProperty().
trans-unit.target: 这些属性可用于使用应用程序的公钥来验证购买。还可以让后端使用QInAppStore :: setPlatformProperty（）在注册产品之前通过传递公钥来验证购买。

trans-unit.source: These properties change the respective anchors of the item.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性会改变项目各自的锚点。

trans-unit.source: These properties control the speed of the move and resize animations for the highlight delegate.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性控制了高亮代表的移动和调整大小动画的速度。

trans-unit.source: These properties define an offset in pixels for the blur direction center point.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义了模糊方向中心点的像素偏移量。

trans-unit.source: These properties define the center and focal points. To specify a simple radial gradient, set focalX and focalY to the value of centerX and centerY, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义了中心和焦点。要指定一个简单的径向梯度，设定focalX和focalY到的值的centerX和centerY分别。

trans-unit.source: These properties define the center and focal radius. For simple radial gradients, focalRadius should be set to 0 (the default value).
trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义中心和焦距。对于简单的径向渐变，应该将focusRadius设置为 0 （默认值）。

trans-unit.source: These properties define the center point of the conical gradient.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义了锥形梯度的中心点。

trans-unit.source: These properties define the offset in pixels for the perceived center point of the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义了旋转中心点的像素偏移量。

trans-unit.source: These properties define the preferred range of the highlight (for the current item) within the view. The preferredHighlightBegin value must be less than the preferredHighlightEnd value.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义视图中突出显示（针对当前项目）的首选范围。该 preferredHighlightBegin 值必须小于 preferredHighlightEnd 值。

trans-unit.source: These properties define the start and end points between which color interpolation occurs. By default both points are set to (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义了颜色插值发生的起始点和结束点。默认情况下,这两个点都被设置为(0,0)。

trans-unit.source: These properties describe the position and size of the currently viewed area. The size is defined as the percentage of the full view currently visible, scaled to 0.0 - 1.0. The page position is usually in the range 0.0 (beginning) to 1.0 minus size ratio (end), i.e. yPosition is in the range 0.0 to 1.0-heightRatio. However, it is possible for the contents to be dragged outside of the normal range, resulting in the page positions also being outside the normal range.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性描述了当前查看区域的位置和大小。大小定义为当前可见的全视图的百分比，缩放为0.0-1.0。页面位置通常在0.0（开始）到1.0减去尺寸比（结束）的范围内，即 yPosition 在0.0到1.0- heightRatio 的范围内。但是，有可能将内容拖动到正常范围之外，从而导致页面位置也超出正常范围。

trans-unit.source: These properties describe whether the view is currently moving horizontally, vertically or in either direction, due to the user dragging the view.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性描述了当前视图是否由于用户拖动视图而在水平、垂直或任一方向上移动。

trans-unit.source: These properties describe whether the view is currently moving horizontally, vertically or in either direction, due to the user either dragging or flicking the view.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性描述了由于用户拖动或轻触视图,视图当前是否在水平、垂直或任一方向上移动。

trans-unit.source: These properties describe whether the view is currently moving horizontally, vertically or in either direction, due to the user flicking the view.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性描述了由于用户轻触视图,视图当前是否在水平、垂直或任一方向上移动。

trans-unit.source: These properties determine the expression to be evaluated and appearance of the section labels.

trans-unit.source: These properties determine the items and their properties that are affected by this action.

trans-unit.source: These properties have the same characteristics as a SmoothedAnimation: if both the velocity and duration are set, the animation will use whichever gives the shorter duration.

trans-unit.source: These properties hold the down indicator item and whether it is pressed or hovered. The down.hovered property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.1, and the down.implicitIndicatorWidth and down.implicitIndicatorHeight properties were introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.5.

trans-unit.source: These properties hold the down indicator item and whether it is pressed or hovered. The down.hovered property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.1, and the down.implicitIndicatorWidth and down.implicitIndicatorHeight properties were introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.5.

trans-unit.source: These properties hold the size of the image that is actually painted. In most cases it is the same as width and height, but when using an Image.PreserveAspectFit or an Image.PreserveAspectCroppaintedWidth or paintedHeight can be smaller or larger than width and height of the Image item.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性保存实际绘制的图像的大小。在大多数情况下，它与 width 和 height 相同，但在使用Image.PreserveAspectFit或Image.PreserveAspectCrop时， paintedWidth 或 paintedHeight 可以小于或大于Image项的 width 和 height 。

trans-unit.source: These properties hold the surface coordinate currently at the top-left corner of the Flickable. For example, if you flick an image up 100 pixels, contentY will increase by 100.

trans-unit.source: This API supports two types of roaming. Application level roaming (ALR) provides the most control over the process. Applications will be notified about upcoming link layer changes and get the opportunity to test the new access point. Eventually they can reject or accept the link layer change. The second form of roaming is referred to as Forced Roaming. The system simply changes the link layer without consulting the application. It is up to the application to detect that some of its internal socket may have become invalid. As a consequence it has to reinitialize those sockets and reestablish the previous user session without any interruption. Forced roaming has the advantage that applications don't have to manage the entire roaming process by themselves.
trans-unit.target: 该API支持两种类型的漫游。应用层漫游(ALR)提供了最多的过程控制。应用程序将被通知即将到来的链路层变化,并获得测试新接入点的机会。最终他们可以拒绝或接受链路层变化。第二种形式的漫游被称为强制漫游。系统只是简单地改变链路层,而不咨询应用程序。应用程序要检测到它的一些内部套接字可能已经失效。因此,它必须重新初始化这些套接字,并在没有任何中断的情况下重新建立以前的用户会话。强制漫游的优点是应用程序不必自己管理整个漫游过程。

trans-unit.target: 此QML类型包含有关发生的证书错误的信息。该错误属性包含错误发生的原因和描述属性保存的是错误的简短本地化描述。该URL属性包含触发错误的URL。

trans-unit.target: 然后,这个Texture可以被场景中的材质使用,在项目上渲染Qt Quick内容。

trans-unit.source: This XML file has to be added to the root directory of the application resources and named QtStoreSimulation.xml.
trans-unit.target: 该XML文件必须添加到应用程序资源的根目录中，并命名为QtStoreSimulation.xml。

trans-unit.source: This XML reader is suitable for a wide range of applications. It is able to parse well-formed XML and can report the namespaces of elements to a content handler; however, it does not parse any external entities. For historical reasons, Attribute Value Normalization and End-of-Line Handling as described in the XML 1.0 specification is not performed.
trans-unit.target: 这个XML阅读器适用于广泛的应用。它能够解析格式良好的 XML,并能向内容处理程序报告元素的命名空间;但是,它不能解析任何外部实体。由于历史原因,XML 1.0规范中描述的 "属性值标准化 "和 "行尾处理 "没有被执行。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class implements some of the widget's look and feel that is common to all GUI styles provided and shipped as part of Qt.
trans-unit.target: 这个抽象类实现了一些widget的外观和感觉,这些外观和感觉在Qt提供的所有GUI样式中是通用的。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class provides an interface for all of Qt's XML readers. Currently there is only one implementation of a reader included in Qt's XML module: QXmlSimpleReader. In future releases there might be more readers with different properties available (e.g. a validating parser).
trans-unit.target: 这个抽象类为Qt的所有XML读取器提供了一个接口。目前，Qt的XML模块中仅包含一种阅读器的实现：QXmlSimpleReader。在将来的版本中，可能会有更多具有不同属性的阅读器（例如，验证解析器）。

trans-unit.source: This accounts for 99% of the user-visible strings you're likely to write.
trans-unit.target: 这占了你可能写的99%的用户可见的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This action should be placed where the "About" menu item is in the application menu. The text of the menu item will be set to "About <application name>". The application name is fetched from the Info.plist file in the application's bundle (See Qt for macOS - Deployment).

trans-unit.target: 这个操作应该放在应用程序菜单中,并赋予应用程序特定的角色。

trans-unit.source: This adaptation also allows better integration with Windows, as Direct3D is the primary vendor-supported solution. Consequently, there are fewer problems anticipated with drivers, operations like window resizes, and special events like graphics device loss caused by device resets or graphics driver updates.
trans-unit.target: 由于Direct3D是主要的厂商支持的解决方案,这种适配还可以更好地与Windows集成。因此,预期的驱动程序、窗口调整大小等操作,以及设备重置或图形驱动程序更新造成的图形设备丢失等特殊事件的问题较少。

trans-unit.source: This address is eligible for publication in DNS.
trans-unit.target: 这个地址有资格在DNS中公布。

trans-unit.source: This address should not be published in DNS and should not be transmitted to other parties, except maybe as the source address of an outgoing packet.
trans-unit.target: 这个地址不应该在DNS中公布,也不应该传送给其他方,除非可能作为外发数据包的源地址。

trans-unit.source: This adds the current directory to the import path so that qmlscene will find the plugin in the imports directory.
trans-unit.target: 这会将当前目录添加到导入路径，以便 qmlscene 在 imports 目录中找到插件。

trans-unit.source: This adds the specified height between lines (in pixels).
trans-unit.target: 增加指定的行间高度(像素)。

trans-unit.source: This affects the locations into which test programs might write files: GenericDataLocation, DataLocation, ConfigLocation, GenericConfigLocation, AppConfigLocation, GenericCacheLocation, CacheLocation. Other locations are not affected.
trans-unit.target: 这会影响测试程序可能在其中写入文件的位置：GenericDataLocation，DataLocation，ConfigLocation，GenericConfigLocation，AppConfigLocation，GenericCacheLocation和CacheLocation。其他位置不受影响。

trans-unit.source: This alias was introduced in Qt 5.10.

trans-unit.target: 这个别名在Qt 5.11中被引入。

trans-unit.source: This allows QHash, QMultiHash and QSet to hold more than 2^32 items on 64 bit platforms.
trans-unit.target: 这允许QHash，QMultiHash和QSet在64位平台上容纳2 ^ 32个以上的项。

trans-unit.target: 这允许C ++应用程序使用QObject :: findChild（）方法在QML组件中定位项目。例如，以下C ++应用程序找到子Rectangle项并动态更改其 color 值：

trans-unit.source: This allows accessing the underlying native texture object, such as, the GLuint texture ID with OpenGL, or the VkImage handle with Vulkan.
trans-unit.target: 这允许访问基础的本机纹理对象，例如使用OpenGL的 GLuint 纹理ID或使用Vulkan的 VkImage 句柄。

trans-unit.source: This allows easy use of the result:
trans-unit.target: 这样一来,就可以方便地使用结果。

trans-unit.source: This allows expressions for multiple operating systems to be joined with a logical OR operator and still work as expected. For example:
trans-unit.target: 这使得多个操作系统的表达式可以用逻辑OR操作符加入,并且仍然可以按照预期的方式工作。例如:

trans-unit.source: This allows the Makefile to be processed using the default rule:
trans-unit.target: 这允许使用默认规则处理Makefile。

trans-unit.source: This allows the path to reuse previous memory allocations.
trans-unit.target: 这使得路径可以重复使用以前的内存分配。

trans-unit.source: This allows the plugin to access QVirtualKeyboardInputContext and other interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 这允许插件访问QVirtualKeyboardInputContext和其他接口。

trans-unit.source: This allows the test to find its testdata regardless of whether the test has been installed, and regardless of whether the test's build tree is equal to the test's source tree.
trans-unit.target: 这使得测试可以找到它的testdata,而不管测试是否已经安装,也不管测试的构建树是否等于测试的源代码树。

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to input a URL or a local file path in the form of a plain string. This string can be manually typed into a location bar, obtained from the clipboard, or passed in via command line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 这允许用户以普通字符串的形式输入一个URL或本地文件路径。这个字符串可以手动输入到位置栏,从剪贴板获取,或者通过命令行参数传递。

trans-unit.source: This allows to pre-select "tar.bz2" for foo.tar.bz2, but still only "txt" for my.file.with.dots.txt.
trans-unit.target: 这就允许foo.tar.bz2预先选择 "tar.bz2",但my.file.with.dots.txt仍然只能选择 "txt"。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to constrain the text that shall finally be entered when editing is done, while leaving users with enough freedom to edit the text from one valid state to another.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你在编辑完成后限制最终输入的文本,同时给用户留下足够的自由度来编辑文本,从一个有效状态到另一个有效状态。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to produce universal applications with valid LaunchImages as required by the Apple App Store.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以根据Apple App Store的要求,用有效的LaunchImages制作通用应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This also allows providing filters in QML plugins, separately from the application.
trans-unit.target: 这也允许在QML插件中提供过滤器,与应用程序分开。

trans-unit.source: This also disables auto detecting the image format.
trans-unit.target: 这也将禁用自动检测图像格式。

trans-unit.source: This also provides a way to change the data in the case where a source model is supplied by a third party which cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 在第三方提供的源模型不能修改的情况下,这也提供了一种改变数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: This also sets the variable QMAKE_CONFIG_TESTS_DIR to the config.tests subdirectory of the project's parent directory. It is possible to override this value after loading the feature file.
trans-unit.target: 这还将变量QMAKE_CONFIG_TESTS_DIR设置为项目的父目录的 config.tests 子目录。加载功能文件后，可以覆盖此值。

trans-unit.source: This alters the text to be rendered in all lowercase type.
trans-unit.target: 这将改变文本的显示方式,使其全部为小写字体。

trans-unit.source: This alters the text to be rendered in all uppercase type.
trans-unit.target: 这将改变文本的显示方式,使其全部为大写字体。

trans-unit.source: This alters the text to be rendered in small-caps type.
trans-unit.target: 这将改变文本的显示方式,使其成为小写字母。

trans-unit.source: This alters the text to be rendered with the first character of each word as an uppercase character.
trans-unit.target: 这将改变文本的渲染方式,将每个单词的第一个字符作为大写字母。

trans-unit.source: This animates newly added items along a path. Notice that each path is specified relative to each item's final destination point, so that items inserted at different indexes start their paths from different positions:
trans-unit.target: 这将沿着路径对新添加的项目进行动画处理。请注意,每条路径都是相对于每个项目的最终目标点而指定的,因此在不同的索引处插入的项目会从不同的位置开始其路径。

trans-unit.source: This appends the two new columns as columns 6, 7, and 8.
trans-unit.target: 这样就把两个新列追加为第6、7、8列。

trans-unit.source: This appends the two new rows as rows 4 and 5.
trans-unit.target: 这样就把两行新的行追加为第4行和第5行。

trans-unit.source: This application implements a generic test container for ActiveX controls. You can insert ActiveX controls installed on your system, and execute methods and modify properties. The container will log information about events and property changes as well as debug output in the log window.
trans-unit.target: 这个应用程序实现了一个ActiveX控件的通用测试容器。您可以插入安装在您系统上的ActiveX控件,并执行方法和修改属性。该容器将在日志窗口中记录有关事件和属性更改以及调试输出的信息。

trans-unit.source: This application object must be constructed before any paint devices (including pixmaps, bitmaps etc.).
trans-unit.target: 必须在任何绘画设备（包括像素图，位图等）之前构造此应用程序对象。

trans-unit.target: 必须在任何绘画设备（包括小部件，像素图，位图等）之前构造此应用程序对象。

trans-unit.source: This applies to custom QML types as well. If a QML type was defined in a file named ColorfulButton.qml (in a directory which was then imported by the client), then a property of type ColorfulButton would also be valid.
trans-unit.target: 这也适用于自定义QML类型。如果在名为 ColorfulButton.qml 的文件（在随后由客户端导入的目录中）中定义了QML类型，则 ColorfulButton 类型的属性也将有效。

trans-unit.source: This approach can prove to be a significant performance gain as only a single file will be loaded, and pieces of data will be given out via the path requested in setFileName().
trans-unit.target: 由于仅加载单个文件，并且通过setFileName（）中请求的路径将给出数据片段，因此该方法可以证明是显着的性能提升。

trans-unit.source: This approach is convenient for applications that depend on a limited number of resources. However, whenever a new file is added to RESOURCES using this approach, it causes
trans-unit.target: 这种方法对于依赖有限数量资源的应用程序很方便。但是，每当使用此方法将新文件添加到 RESOURCES 时，都会导致

trans-unit.source: This approach is convenient when you need to specify a whole palette with all color groups.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要指定整个调色板的所有颜色组时,这种方法很方便。

trans-unit.source: This approach is different from rendering shapes via QQuickPaintedItem or the 2D Canvas because the path never gets rasterized in software. Therefore Shape is suitable for creating shapes spreading over larger areas of the screen, avoiding the performance penalty for texture uploads or framebuffer blits. In addition, the declarative API allows manipulating, binding to, and even animating the path element properties like starting and ending position, the control points, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法与通过QQuickPaintedItem或2D Canvas 渲染形状不同，因为路径永远不会在软件中栅格化。因此，Shape适用于创建散布在屏幕较大区域的形状，从而避免了纹理上载或帧缓冲区模糊带来的性能损失。另外，声明性API允许操作，绑定甚至对路径元素属性（例如起点和终点位置，控制点等）进行动画处理。

trans-unit.source: This attached property controls the maximum height of the split item. The preferredHeight is bound within the minimumHeight and maximumHeight. A split item cannot be dragged to be larger than its maximumHeight.
trans-unit.target: 此附加属性控制拆分项目的最大高度。该preferredHeight是内势必minimumHeight和maximumHeight。拆分项目不能拖动到大于其 maximumHeight 。

trans-unit.source: This attached property controls the maximum width of the split item. The preferredWidth is bound within the minimumWidth and maximumWidth. A split item cannot be dragged to be larger than its maximumWidth.

trans-unit.source: This attached property controls the minimum height of the split item. The preferredHeight is bound within the minimumHeight and maximumHeight. A split item cannot be dragged to be smaller than its minimumHeight.

trans-unit.source: This attached property controls the minimum width of the split item. The preferredWidth is bound within the minimumWidth and maximumWidth. A split item cannot be dragged to be smaller than its minimumWidth.

trans-unit.source: This attached property controls the preferred height of the split item. The preferred height will be used as the size of the item, and will be bound within the minimumHeight and maximumHeight. If the preferred height is not set, the item's implicitHeight will be used.
trans-unit.target: 此附加属性控制拆分项目的首选高度。首选高度将用作项目的大小，并将被限制在minimumHeight和maximumHeight内。如果未设置首选高度，则将使用该项的implicitHeight。

trans-unit.source: This attached property controls the preferred width of the split item. The preferred width will be used as the size of the item, and will be bound within the minimumWidth and maximumWidth. If the preferred width is not set, the item's implicitWidth will be used.

trans-unit.source: This attached property controls whether the item takes the remaining space in the split view after all other items have been laid out.
trans-unit.target: 此附加属性控制项目是否在所有其他项目布局后占用分割视图的剩余空间。

trans-unit.source: This attached property holds a component to use as a visual item that implements background dimming for modal popups. It is created for and stacked below visible modal popups.
trans-unit.target: 这个附加的属性持有一个组件,用作实现模态弹出的背景调光的可视化项目。它为可见的模态弹出窗口创建并堆叠在其下方。

trans-unit.source: This attached property holds a component to use as a visual item that implements background dimming for modeless popups. It is created for and stacked below visible dimming popups.

trans-unit.source: This attached property holds a list of the indexes of the items in view that are the target of the relevant operation.
trans-unit.target: 这个附加属性持有视图中作为相关操作目标的项目的索引列表。

trans-unit.source: This attached property holds a value from -visibleItemCount / 2 to visibleItemCount / 2, which represents how far away this item is from being the current item, with 0 being completely current.
trans-unit.target: 此附加属性持有一个值，该值从 -visibleItemCount / 2 到 visibleItemCount / 2 ，表示该项目与当前项目的距离有多远，其中 0 完全是当前项目。

trans-unit.source: This attached property holds the StackLayout that manages this child item.

trans-unit.source: This attached property holds the accent color of the theme. The property can be attached to any window or item. The value is propagated to children.

trans-unit.source: This attached property holds the application window. The property can be attached to any item. The value is null if the item is not in an ApplicationWindow.
trans-unit.target: 该附加属性保存应用程序窗口。该属性可以附加到任何项目。如果该项不在ApplicationWindow中，则该值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: This attached property holds the application window. The property can be attached to any item. The value is null if the item is not in an ApplicationWindow.

trans-unit.source: This attached signal is emitted when the item it's attached to has been removed from the stack. It can be used to safely destroy an Item that was pushed onto the stack, for example:

trans-unit.source: This attribute has been deprecated.

trans-unit.source: This attribute has been deprecated. Use AA_PluginApplication instead.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性已经过时了。使用AA_PluginApplication代替。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is no longer fully supported in Qt 5. It ensures that widgets are created as soon as they are constructed. By default, resources for widgets are allocated on demand to improve efficiency and minimize resource usage. Setting or clearing this attribute affects widgets constructed after the change. Setting it tells Qt to create toplevel windows immediately. Therefore, if it is important to minimize resource consumption, do not set this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性在Qt 5中不再完全支持,它确保了widget在构造完成后立即被创建。默认情况下,widget 的资源是按需分配的,以提高效率和减少资源使用。设置或清除此属性会影响改变后构建的widgets。设置它会告诉Qt立即创建toplevel窗口。因此,如果需要尽量减少资源消耗,请不要设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is only required to be set on Linux/BlueZ systems with older Linux kernels (v3.3 or lower), or if CAP_NET_ADMIN is not set for the executable. The default value of the attribute is RandomAddress.
trans-unit.target: 仅在具有较旧Linux内核（v3.3或更低版本）的Linux / BlueZ系统上，或者未为可执行文件设置CAP_NET_ADMIN时，才需要设置此属性。该属性的默认值是RandomAddress。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the language the custom widget is intended for. It is mainly there to prevent C++-plugins from appearing in Qt Jambi.

trans-unit.target: 这个音频缓冲区将复制

trans-unit.source: This authentication mechanism currently supports no incoming or outgoing options.
trans-unit.target: 这种认证机制目前不支持入库和出库选项。

trans-unit.source: This automatic rotation of the axes is handy is some usecases, for example in a bubble level application that measures how level a surface is by looking at the X axis value of an accelerometer. When the device and screen orientation change by 90 degrees, an application developer does not need to change anything, he can continue using the X axis value even though the device is rotated. Without automatic axes orientation, the application developer would need to look at the Y values instead, thereby adding code to the application that reads from a different axis depending on the screen orientation.
trans-unit.target: 这种自动旋转轴的功能在某些情况下非常方便,例如在一个气泡水平仪应用中,通过查看加速度计的X轴值来测量表面的水平度。当设备和屏幕方向发生90度变化时,应用程序开发人员不需要改变任何东西,他可以继续使用X轴值,即使设备被旋转。如果没有自动的轴方向,应用开发者就需要看Y轴值来代替,从而在应用中添加代码,根据屏幕方向从不同的轴读取。

trans-unit.source: This automatically removes it from the application.
trans-unit.target: 这将自动从应用程序中删除它。

trans-unit.source: This can be a constraint for embedded devices. In multi-process, each client needs to have its own graphics buffer, which it sends to the compositor. Consequently, you use more video memory compared to the single-process case: where everything is drawn at once and there is no need to store the different parts in intermediary buffers.
trans-unit.target: 这对于嵌入式设备来说可能是一个制约因素。在多进程中,每个客户端都需要有自己的图形缓冲区,并将其发送给合成器。因此,与单进程相比,您需要使用更多的视频内存:在单进程中,所有的东西都是一次性绘制的,不需要将不同的部分存储在中间缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: This can be any axis in 3D space. By default the axis is (0, 0, 1), which is aligned with the Z axis. If you provide another axis, QGraphicsRotation will provide a transformation that rotates around this axis. For example, if you would like to rotate an item around its X axis, you could pass (1, 0, 0) as the axis.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是3D空间中的任何轴。默认情况下，该轴为（0，0，1），该轴与Z轴对齐。如果提供另一个轴，则QGraphicsRotation将提供围绕该轴旋转的变换。例如，如果您想绕X轴旋转某个项目，则可以传递（1、0、0）作为该轴。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to attach meta-data to the message. The field name should consist of a domain prefix (possibly the conventional file extension of the file format the field is inspired by), a hyphen and the actual field name in underscore-delimited notation. For storage in TS files, the field name together with the prefix "extra-" will form an XML element name. The field contents will be XML-escaped, but otherwise appear verbatim as the element's contents. Any number of unique fields can be added to each message.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用来给消息附加元数据。字段名应该由一个域前缀(可能是字段所受启发的文件格式的常规文件扩展名)、一个连字符和以下划线分隔的实际字段名组成。对于TS文件的存储,字段名与前缀 "extra-"一起将形成一个XML元素名。字段的内容将被XML格式化,但在其他方面则与元素的内容一样逐字显示。每个消息可以添加任意数量的唯一字段。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to avoid the situation where a secondary view that updates on a lower frequency will throttle the frame rate of the client application.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用来避免以较低频率更新的辅助视图会节制客户端应用的帧率的情况。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to color items in a way that provides a more native look and feel.

trans-unit.source: This can change the value of outputFormat(). If the file name has the ".pdf" suffix PDF is generated. If the file name has a suffix other than ".pdf", the output format used is the one set with setOutputFormat().
trans-unit.target: 这可以更改outputFormat（）的值。如果文件名带有“ .pdf”后缀，则生成PDF。如果文件名的后缀不是“ .pdf”，则使用的输出格式是通过setOutputFormat（）设置的一种。

trans-unit.source: This can change when a zone is focused or loses focus, or new focus zones have been detected.
trans-unit.target: 当一个区段聚焦或失去聚焦,或检测到新的聚焦区段时,这种情况会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: This can happen if the stream failed to write to the underlying device or if the data to be written contained invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果流未能写入底层设备,或者要写入的数据包含无效字符,就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: This can have different meanings for different types of elements. For example, for a QStyle::CE_PushButton element it would be the rectangle for the entire button, while for a QStyle::CE_PushButtonLabel element it would be just the area for the push button label.
trans-unit.target: 对于不同类型的元素，这可能具有不同的含义。例如，对于QStyle :: CE_PushButton元素，它将是整个按钮的矩形，而对于QStyle :: CE_PushButtonLabel元素，它将仅是按钮标签的区域。

trans-unit.source: This can improve performance depending on the scene contents. It is typically scenes with lots of overlapping objects and expensive fragment shading that benefit from this. At the same time, it is worth noting that the renderer performs front to back sorting for opaque objects, which in itself helps reducing unnecessary fragment shading, and therefore the Z-prepass does not always bring significant improvements.
trans-unit.target: 这可以根据场景内容提高性能。通常是有大量重叠对象和昂贵的碎片着色的场景才会从中受益。同时,值得注意的是,渲染器会对不透明的对象进行从前到后的排序,这本身就有助于减少不必要的碎片着色,因此Z-prepass并不总是能带来显著的改善。

trans-unit.source: This can often be useful when loading a large set of application icons that may change based on a setting, or that can be edited by a user and later recreated. The resource is immediately loaded into memory, either as a result of a single file read operation, or as a memory mapped file.
trans-unit.target: 当加载大量的应用程序图标时,这通常是有用的,这些图标可能会根据设置而改变,或者可以由用户编辑并在以后重新创建。该资源会立即加载到内存中,可以是单个文件读取操作的结果,也可以是内存映射文件。

trans-unit.source: This change is done such that the center coordinate is still at the center of the geo rectangle, which may result in a geo rectangle with a smaller height than expected.
trans-unit.target: 这种改变是为了使中心坐标仍然在地理矩形的中心,这可能导致地理矩形的高度比预期的小。

trans-unit.source: This chapter describes how to set up qmake project files for three common project types that are based on Qt: application, library, and plugin. Although all project types use many of the same variables, each of them uses project-specific variables to customize output files.
trans-unit.target: 本章介绍了如何为基于Qt的三种常见项目类型设置qmake项目文件:应用程序、库和插件。尽管所有的项目类型都使用了许多相同的变量,但它们中的每一个都使用了项目专用的变量来定制输出文件。

trans-unit.source: This chapter describes most of the common editing operations that you will need to perform using a cursor, from basic insertion of text and document elements to more complex manipulation of document structures.
trans-unit.target: 本章介绍了大部分常用的编辑操作,从基本的文本和文档元素的插入,到更复杂的文档结构操作,您都需要使用光标来执行。

trans-unit.source: This chapter discusses different approaches and options available for implementing right-to-left language support for Qt Quick applications. Some common right-to-left languages include Arabic, Hebrew, Persian and Urdu. Most changes include making sure that text translated to right-to-left languages is properly aligned to the right, and horizontally ordered content in views, lists and grids flows correctly from the right to left.
trans-unit.target: 本章讨论了为Qt Quick应用程序实现从右到左的语言支持的不同方法和选项。一些常见的从右到左的语言包括阿拉伯语、希伯来语、波斯语和乌尔都语。大多数变化包括确保翻译成右向左语言的文本正确地向右对齐,以及视图、列表和网格中的水平排序内容正确地从右向左流动。

trans-unit.source: This chapter shows how to combine basic C++ with the functionality provided by Qt to create a few small graphical interface (GUI) applications.
trans-unit.target: 本章介绍了如何将基本的C++与Qt提供的功能相结合,创建一些小型的图形界面(GUI)应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic contains the language definition based on ISO639-1.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性包含了基于ISO639-1的语言定义。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic contains the limits between the heart rate zones for the 2-zone heart rate definition.

trans-unit.source: This characteristic contains the limits between the heart rate zones for the 3-zone heart rate definition.

trans-unit.source: This characteristic defines the category of the alert and how many new alerts of that category have occurred in the server device.
trans-unit.target: 该特性定义了警报的类别,以及该类别的新警报在服务器设备中发生了多少次。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic describes the available data in the WeightMeasurement characteristic.

trans-unit.source: This characteristic describes the available features in the BodyCompositionMeasurement characteristic.

trans-unit.source: This characteristic exposes the rainfall in meters.

trans-unit.source: This characteristic has the same format as the Blood Pressure Measurement characteristic.

trans-unit.source: This characteristic is related to the Environmental Sensing Service.

trans-unit.source: This characteristic provides a heat index in degree Celsius.

trans-unit.source: This class acts as a container for single candlestick items. Each item is drawn to its own category when using QBarCategoryAxis. QDateTimeAxis and QValueAxis can be used as alternatives to QBarCategoryAxis. In this case, each candlestick item is drawn according to its timestamp value.
trans-unit.target: 此类充当单个烛台项目的容器。使用QBarCategoryAxis时，每个项目都绘制到自己的类别。QDateTimeAxis和QValueAxis可以用来替代QBarCategoryAxis。在这种情况下，每个烛台项目均根据其时间戳值绘制。

trans-unit.source: This class allows an application to embed a toolbar in the thumbnail of a window, which is shown when hovering over its taskbar icon. It provides quick access to the window's commands without requiring the user to restore or activate the window.
trans-unit.target: 该类允许应用程序在窗口的缩略图中嵌入一个工具栏,当鼠标悬停在其任务栏图标上时就会显示。它提供了对窗口命令的快速访问,而不需要用户恢复或激活窗口。

trans-unit.source: This class allows you to play uncompressed audio files (typically WAV files) in a generally lower latency way, and is suitable for "feedback" type sounds in response to user actions (e.g. virtual keyboard sounds, positive or negative feedback for popup dialogs, or game sounds). If low latency is not important, consider using the QMediaPlayer class instead, since it supports a wider variety of media formats and is less resource intensive.
trans-unit.target: 此类允许您以通常较低的延迟方式播放未压缩的音频文件（通常是WAV文件），并且适合响应用户操作（例如虚拟键盘声音，弹出对话框的正反馈或负反馈）的“反馈”型声音。游戏声音）。如果低延迟并不重要，请考虑改用QMediaPlayer类，因为它支持更多种媒体格式，并且资源占用较少。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to decode a stream of CBOR content directly from either a QByteArray or a QIODevice. CBOR is the Concise Binary Object Representation, a very compact form of binary data encoding that is compatible with JSON. It was created by the IETF Constrained RESTful Environments (CoRE) WG, which has used it in many new RFCs. It is meant to be used alongside the CoAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于直接从QByteArray或QIODevice解码CBOR内容流。 CBOR是简洁的二进制对象表示形式，它是一种非常紧凑的二进制数据编码形式，与JSON兼容。它是由IETF约束RESTful环境（CoRE）工作组创建的，该工作组已在许多新的RFC中使用了它。它旨在与CoAP协议一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to discover Classic and Low Energy Bluetooth devices. The individual device type can be determined via the QBluetoothDeviceInfo::coreConfigurations() attribute. In most cases the list returned by discoveredDevices() contains both types of devices. However not every platform can detect both types of devices. On platforms with this limitation (for example iOS only suports Low Energy discovery), the discovery process will limit the search to the type which is supported.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于发现经典和低能耗蓝牙设备。可以通过QBluetoothDeviceInfo :: coreConfigurations（）属性确定各个设备的类型。在大多数情况下，discoveredDevices（）返回的列表包含两种类型的设备。但是，并非每个平台都能检测到两种类型的设备。在具有此限制的平台上（例如，iOS仅支持低能耗发现），发现过程会将搜索限制为受支持的类型。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to explain the underlying data by adding labeled categories. Unlike QBarCategoryAxis, QCategoryAxis allows the widths of the category ranges to be specified freely.
trans-unit.target: 此类可以通过添加带标签的类别来解释基础数据。与QBarCategoryAxis不同，QCategoryAxis允许自由指定类别范围的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to explain the underlying data by adding labeled categories. Unlike QBarCategoryAxis, QCategoryAxis allows the widths of the category ranges to be specified freely.

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to hold an associative container in CBOR, a map between a key and a value type. CBOR is the Concise Binary Object Representation, a very compact form of binary data encoding that is a superset of JSON. It was created by the IETF Constrained RESTful Environments (CoRE) WG, which has used it in many new RFCs. It is meant to be used alongside the CoAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于在CBOR中保存关联容器，CBOR是键和值类型之间的映射。CBOR是简洁二进制对象表示形式，它是二进制数据编码的非常紧凑的形式，是JSON的超集。它是由IETF约束RESTful环境（CoRE）工作组创建的，该工作组已在许多新的RFC中使用了它。它旨在与CoAP协议一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to hold one of the many types available in CBOR. CBOR is the Concise Binary Object Representation, a very compact form of binary data encoding that is a superset of JSON. It was created by the IETF Constrained RESTful Environments (CoRE) WG, which has used it in many new RFCs. It is meant to be used alongside the CoAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于保存CBOR中可用的多种类型之一。CBOR是简洁二进制对象表示形式，它是二进制数据编码的非常紧凑的形式，是JSON的超集。它是由IETF约束RESTful环境（CoRE）工作组创建的，该工作组已在许多新的RFC中使用了它。它旨在与CoAP协议一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to hold one sequential container in CBOR (an array). CBOR is the Concise Binary Object Representation, a very compact form of binary data encoding that is a superset of JSON. It was created by the IETF Constrained RESTful Environments (CoRE) WG, which has used it in many new RFCs. It is meant to be used alongside the CoAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于在CBOR（数组）中保存一个顺序容器。CBOR是简洁二进制对象表示形式，它是二进制数据编码的非常紧凑的形式，是JSON的超集。它是由IETF约束RESTful环境（CoRE）工作组创建的，该工作组已在许多新的RFC中使用了它。它旨在与CoAP协议一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to quickly encode a stream of CBOR content directly to either a QByteArray or QIODevice. CBOR is the Concise Binary Object Representation, a very compact form of binary data encoding that is compatible with JSON. It was created by the IETF Constrained RESTful Environments (CoRE) WG, which has used it in many new RFCs. It is meant to be used alongside the CoAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于快速将CBOR内容流直接编码为QByteArray或QIODevice。CBOR是简洁的二进制对象表示形式，它是一种非常紧凑的二进制数据编码形式，与JSON兼容。它是由IETF约束RESTful环境（CoRE）工作组创建的，该工作组已在许多新的RFC中使用了它。它旨在与CoAP协议一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to reference a surface buffer. As long as a reference to the buffer exists, it is owned by the compositor and the client cannot modify it.
trans-unit.target: 这个类可以用来引用一个表面缓冲区。只要存在对缓冲区的引用,它就归合成器所有,客户端不能修改它。

trans-unit.source: This class collects a set of parameterless signals, and re-emits them with integer, string or widget parameters corresponding to the object that sent the signal.
trans-unit.target: 这个类收集了一组无参数的信号,并以整数、字符串或widget参数与发送信号的对象相对应,重新发送它们。

trans-unit.source: This class collects a set of parameterless signals, and re-emits them with integer, string or widget parameters corresponding to the object that sent the signal. Note that in most cases you can use lambdas for passing custom parameters to slots. This is less costly and will simplify the code.
trans-unit.target: 这个类收集了一组无参数信号,并使用与发送信号的对象相对应的整数、字符串或widget参数重新发送它们。请注意,在大多数情况下,您可以使用lambdas将自定义参数传递给插槽。这样成本较低,而且会简化代码。

trans-unit.source: This class combines a QQmlEngine and QQmlComponent to provide a convenient way to load a single QML file. It also exposes some central application functionality to QML, which a C++/QML hybrid application would normally control from C++.
trans-unit.target: 此类结合了QQmlEngine和QQmlComponent来提供方便的方式来加载单个QML文件。它还向QML公开了一些中央应用程序功能，而C ++ / QML混合应用程序通常会从C ++控制这些功能。

trans-unit.source: This class contains functions that provide simple interfaces to these services that indicate whether they succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 这个类包含了为这些服务提供简单接口的函数,这些接口指示这些服务是成功还是失败。

trans-unit.source: This class contains functions to query standard locations on the local filesystem, for common tasks such as user-specific directories or system-wide configuration directories.
trans-unit.target: 该类包含了查询本地文件系统标准位置的函数,用于查询用户特定目录或全系统配置目录等常见任务。

trans-unit.source: This class contains the information and API for HTML5 desktop and push notifications.
trans-unit.target: 该类包含HTML5桌面和推送通知的信息和API。

trans-unit.target: 该类描述了DOM实现所支持的功能。目前支持DOM Level 1的XML子集和DOM Level 2 Core。

trans-unit.source: This class does not fully implement an item by itself; in particular, it does not implement boundingRect() and paint(), which are inherited by QGraphicsItem.
